alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 2:13PM AKST until January 09 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Strong winds with blowing snow, low visibility and cold wind chills occuring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting to 40 mph. Wind chills to 55 below. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold wind chills will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. The strongest winds and lowest visibility are expected now through tonight. The coldest winds chills are expected Saturday night. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
